title: Alton Towers
summary: Alton Towers Resort (UK: /ˈɒltən/ (listen) OL-tən) (often referred to as Alton Towers or ATR for short) is a theme park and resort complex in Staffordshire, England, near the village of Alton.[3] The park is operated by Merlin Entertainments Group and incorporates a theme park, water park, spa, mini golf and hotel complex.
